name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian dish featuring al dente spaghetti noodles topped with a rich and flavorful meat sauce.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded and fried chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese, creating a delightful combination of flavors.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy cookies with a perfect balance of sweet and chocolatey flavors, enjoyed by people of all ages.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Tender strips of beef cooked with colorful vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce, perfect for a quick and delicious meal.

name: Blueberry Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes studded with juicy blueberries, served with maple syrup and a dollop of whipped cream, making breakfast extra special.
